Title: Relates to permitting unemployment benefits in certain cases of voluntary separation from employment during the COVID-19 emergency
Summary: Permits unemployment benefits in the case of voluntary separation from employment during the COVID-19 emergency for persons over age 65 or persons with health conditions which make them at risk where the claimant has a reasonable belief that their working environment is unsafe.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to permitting unemployment benefits in the case of certain voluntary separation from employment during the COVID-19 emergency; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
